moduleTitle: Module 2.1: Reverse Engineering and Spatial Visualization

infoSections.text: Spatial visualization is incredibly useful in neurotechnology as it enables precise plament and design of neurostimulators, brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), and implantable devices, and assists in optimizing circuit layouts and mechanical enclosures to fit complex anatomical structures with minimal invasiveness.

tasks.taskDescription: Watch this video and understand how you will apply reverse engineering and spatial visualization.
